GeneDef.label: genemaker
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that replicate their genetic code, and then form metallic growths on the body, recording a fragment of the code there. After some time, the growth detaches from the body, and the carrier experiences a short-term effect of xenogerm replication.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every (*DateTime)5-9 days(/DateTime) a <color=#8a8ae6>genepack</color> spawns containing one <color=#8a8ae6>random gene</color> of the carrier or a <color=#8a8ae6>xenotype</color> 40% similar to it.
After spawning, the carrier receives (*DateTime)4-6 days(/DateTime) of <color=#8a8ae6>genes regrowing</color>.
